casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
v.
RIVERA, et al. 245P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Angel L. Rivera, Jennifer Lynn Wilson, for Wilson, Jennifer L. (aka Jennifer Wilson), et al. Ashley H. Campbell, Raleigh, Rebecca F. Holljes, Attorneys at Law, for Bank of America, N.A. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of July 2017 by Defendant (Jennifer L. Wilson) to Withdraw Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017." Ervin, J. recused
